categories.strCategoryDescription: Chicken is a type of domesticated fowl, a subspecies of the red junglefowl. It is one of the most common and widespread domestic animals, with a total population of more than 19 billion as of 2011.[1] Humans commonly keep chickens as a source of food (consuming both their meat and eggs) and, more rarely, as pets.

content.title: Latte
content.description: As the most popular coffee drink out there, the latte is comprised of a shot of espresso and steamed milk with just a touch of foam. It can be ordered plain or with a flavor shot of anything from vanilla to pumpkin spice.

content.title: Cappuccino
content.description: Cappuccino is a latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top. Sometimes you can find variations that use cream instead of milk or ones that throw in flavor shot, as well.

content.title: Americano
content.description: With a similar flavor to black coffee, the americano consists of an espresso shot diluted in hot water.

content.title: Espresso
content.description: An espresso shot can be served solo or used as the foundation of most coffee drinks, like lattes and macchiatos.
